channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Photo Gallery, Sliders, Proofing and Themes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Photo Gallery, Sliders, Proofing and Themes

item.title: CVE-2024-5442|2024-08-01T21:11:12.789Z -- unknown -- photo%20gallery%2C%20sliders%2C%20proofing%20and%20themes
item.description: The Photo Gallery, Sliders, Proofing and WordPress plugin before 3.59.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).

item.title: CVE-2024-5442|2024-07-13T06:00:11.530Z -- unknown -- photo%20gallery%2C%20sliders%2C%20proofing%20and%20themes
item.description: The Photo Gallery, Sliders, Proofing and WordPress plugin before 3.59.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
